website_summaries.verdict: While this chin strap may not work for everyone, the breathable material makes it worth considering for those who prefer a lightweight design.
pros: Stands out for the mesh-like material that's breathable and comfortable on the skin
A good pick for people that tend to sweat at night
Has a Velcro fastener that makes it easy to put on and take off
cons: Size runs small, so this chin strap may not work for larger individuals

customer_reviews.title: No more snoring
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my husband and I must say it actually works and he is a heavy snorer I recommend this to someone who snores
customer_reviews.author: Amelymrivera

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for all night wear.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to snore quite a bit specially on days when the air pollution is high. These have helped in this respect ( i have been told by the wife ) and therefore I am very happy with this product. the material is soft on the skin and it appears will last some time given proper care. The velcro straps make this product adjustable to different size heads. I will probably buy one of this for my DAD who also tends to snore a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: Saves my sanity.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. I have not been sleeping well and the snoring is making it so much worse. It takes me forever to fall asleep and that is with earplugs. When he wears it, I get much better sleep. I do still wake up to pee. He falls asleep fast so it doesn't seems to keep him awake.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Best so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd different chin strap. It is smaller than the other 2. It is really tighter. It is lighter weight and better ventilated. I certainly sweat less. . It is not exactly what I expected. From the pictures I expected it to be finished around the ears. When it came in there is no stitching, or finish there. All of my other chin straps have worn out in this area. Durability is a question.
customer_reviews.author: C & J P

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. His snoring recently has been making it hard for me to sleep. Took a little convincing for him to even try this but I'm surprised that the snoring has reduced. He says it looks silly but is quite comfortable to sleep in. As for me I can finally get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: None of these chin straps are really comfortable, as they have to hold your mouth shut to do the job. That said, this product is hands down the best of the bunch, and I've tried several brands. The fabric is much thinner and more breathable than those made of neoprene, so that it doesn't make my chin sweat and need frequent washing. It's more expensive than the others, but well worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Smal
customer_reviews.text: These are for a small head I have a normal size head and it’s too small
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Small size and any adjustment to fit a bigger sized head causes a “sticky” situation.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being advertised as being adjustable this chinstrap is built for very small heads. Any adjustment to the size of this device to anything larger than its original size, including using the strap that is enclosed with this product, leaves portions of the hooks—hooks (think scratchy end of Velcro®️) and loop closure—exposed, which in turn catches on anything soft. If you have a small head size, think tween sized head, then this would probably be a good product. Otherwise, I would advise others to stay away from this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Defend_Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does a perfect job on fixing my jaw - I've only worn it for about 3 weeks and now I don't have the habit of breathing through my mouth while sleeping. The only downside is that the hook-and-loop sticks very easily onto the band outside of the patted area which could damage the strap pretty easily. I have to be super careful when I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: May Z.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely uncomfortable for my boyfriend. I want both of us to get better sleep, but this isn't the way. He was able to get it on, but it's too small and squeezes his whole head and face. It would keep him from snoring I guess, but I'd never ask him to wear it all night.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough
customer_reviews.text: The soft neoprene open-cell fabric is very soft and can be molded onto my chin! Neoprene is odorless and breathable. Even if it is warm at night, it will not be too hot to stay overnight. The ear space is cut appropriately so the neoprene will not put any pressure on the TMJ, nor will it cut into the back of my ears. Except for slipping overnight, these problems are just like deal breaker problems for me like other chin straps! All in all, this chin strap is as close as possible to perfection. Value for money, because the design and materials are very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R Benson

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective chin strap I have ever seen! I suffer from my mouth opening when I sleep and it gets really dry. This chin strap is comfortable and adjustable. And it really holds my mouth closed! I reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Bouvier

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight with no room to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I can see how this works by pulling your chin back which I guess opens your throat better. But this product was way too tight and had no room for adjustment. I tried to put up with it but it literally was squeezing my head. If you have a small head this may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: BocaPope

customer_reviews.title: very worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: This chinstrap was delivered quickly. It fits well and performs as it should. It is MUCH more comfortable than others I have used and does nor make my chin sore. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen the elasticity, fit the skin closely, cooperate with the firm Velcro, easy to paste
customer_reviews.text: Skin friendly, breathable and comfortable fabric, skin friendly and breathable, not comfortable, strengthen the elasticity, closely fit the skin, with a firm Velcro, easy to paste, hot and no front overall thin and breathable Velcro, part of the pyrolytic and technical fit, part of the combination is more light and easy to wear. Easy to stop sweat, comfortable and breathable, skin friendly, breathable and comfortable fabric.

customer_reviews.title: A little tight.
customer_reviews.text: Size is a little small, fits too tight Only about a month old and velcro starting to wear out. Will probably have to sew in new velcro soon. Elastic seems to be of good quality . Overall works !! Anthony H.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product received, the fabric is close to the skin and breathable, close to the skin, relaxed and comfortable, the price is very favorable. Now in order to give the family a comfortable sleep quality. I take it with me every night when I go to bed. It has become a habit to wear it by myself. The quality is also very good, and it is very convenient to wear it. I can sleep at night without any inconvenience or discomfort, and a series of problems.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Got my dad to stop snoring.
customer_reviews.text: So thankful I found this because now we don’t have to hear the loud dad snores all throughout the house. He says the chin strap is still comfortable to sleep in and does not feel constricting at all. I can’t recommend this enough and I promise everyone in your household will be so thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Ale Zero

customer_reviews.title: A product that works very well
customer_reviews.text: This size is just right for me, it fits my face, I have been wearing it for a week, the material is very breathable, it won't feel stuffy, the mouth will not open after sleeping, the mouth will not open after sleeping with this thing, the throat is dry and alleviated, the throat is not uncomfortable when I wake up in the morning. The tension can be adjusted by itself, and the entire lower jaw is gently lifted, allowing the teeth to close naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Maisoon Iskandarani

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I wasnt expecting much considering the great price but these are awesome so far. I honestly can't tell a difference between these and the actual oral b ones. And you cant beat the price. We are a family if 6 and we all have the oral b electric brushes so replacement heads can get pretty pricey. So glad I gave these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Fincke Mb

customer_reviews.title: It really helps to improve snoring
customer_reviews.text: I've been thinking about buying this one all the time. It's really easy to use after receiving the goods. It reduces the frequency of mouth breathing. It's very good. I haven't evaluated it all the time. I like it very much. The quality is good. The service attitude is good. People who snore are worth owning. It's worth the money. It's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Suitable and easy to adjust. The best chin strap!
customer_reviews.text: I have high hopes for this product. It fits the ear perfectly and is easy to adjust. It is much better than the products I bought before. One strap is behind the neck and the other is strapped to the top of the head. It will not slip off the top of the head or chin like a simple strap with a single strap on the top of the head. Elastic bands and fabrics are also softer than other bands, so they feel more natural and will not interfere with sleep. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Belden

customer_reviews.title: The effect is obvious.
customer_reviews.text: As described, they were very successful. I mainly use them after I sleep, but for me the effect is obvious, smooth and will not scratch or irritate the facial skin.
customer_reviews.author: JRG Max Solis

customer_reviews.title: I got rid of mouth breathing
customer_reviews.text: I don't snore while asleep but I bought it to prevent breathing through my mouth when I’m sleeping. It was a bit tight when I first used it as it’s my first time using that sort of product. But you can easily get used to it. I realized that I don’t breathe with my mouth during sleep because I don't wale up with the dry mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable! I have a smaller sized head and this fits perfectly. And surprisingly I don’t get hot wearing it at night. It takes a minute to figure out how to put it on, but after that, so easy! Don’t be fooled by other anti-snoring aids with more and higher ratings. Read those reviews and you will quickly see that they are either generic or for the wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Ceejayh

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My jaw seems to drop straight back towards my neck instead of just falling open. This causes my chin to disengage from the mask. With this chinstrap, it not only keeps my Dreamwear full face mask from disengaging from my chin (it covers the bottom half of the mask as well as my chin), but keeps my mouth closed. It is very comfortable to sleep in and after three weeks of use, I do not feel right without it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Guess it doesn't work because it sure didn't keep me from snoring and I even tried wearing it really tight.
customer_reviews.author: SusanP

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Comfortable and soft. After a minutes I forget I'm even wearing it. I have had the best sleeps wearing this. It's adjustable and fits snuggly. Definitely would recommend to anyone with sleep apnea, or who snores. I put this on and I don't wake up constantly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Marinez

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We have a few people on our family with sleep apnea. They have to use a CPAP to sleep. CPAPS have masks to cover the mouth and nose, or just to cover the nose. If you use a nose only mask (which is more comfortable), you have to be able to keep your mouth closed while you are sleeping. This wasn’t happening at our house. This has changed that and opens up the world of nose only masks!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cline

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Holds the chin to the face, haven't tried on during the sleep yet but the quality of the cloth is goos and stretchable without causing pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jaahnavi

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chinstrap for use with my CPAP. It holds my mouth closed when I go into deep sleep and allows my CPAP to work properly. It is good quality, strong material. The strap is easily adjustable so I can get just the right amount of tension on it. I've washed it a couple of times and it held up well. I tried a couple of other straps before this one and this one works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything for my snoring
customer_reviews.text: Did not prevent me from snoring. I use a sleep app to track how much I snore and I didn’t notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I find that if I can get the snore guard on tight enough, it does work. I am looking forward to the new, smaller version of the snore guard coming out soon. I have sewn on more velcro to the current one to achieve enough tightness to keep my mouth from opening too far. Over all pleased with this product and the manufacturers care how their product is working. I will buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: William Giannini

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few months ago and it helped my snoring from the first night. I no longer wake up in the morning with a headache. After a few months, the material softens and the mouthpiece looses a little of its effectiveness so I have just bought another two with the intention of changing them every couple of months. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kozhevnikova

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product held up to its description. However I had zero success with it. That doesn’t mean someone else won’t.
customer_reviews.author: CLOUTS5

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Best chinstrap I have found to date. It's comfortable. The only time I feel it is when it catches my beard. Breathable, easy to use and adjust. You do not have to over-tighten it to work and holds your chin in place better than any other strap I have found. and you really barely notice it when on. Not like the other dozen I have tried.I am very happy with this chinstrap. Price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Improved sleep
customer_reviews.text: I purchased others from my cpap supplies co but they were flimsy & ineffective. I feel this chin support is excellent and definitely offers a great deal more support. It would be nice if The area where the chin touches the stretch strap could be lined with a patch of softer fabric but as it is it’s not a problem. Greatly improved quality of my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L Mosher Rood

customer_reviews.title: Stuffy nose = snore
customer_reviews.text: Works great when I can breathe through my nose. When my nose is stuffy, I still snore

customer_reviews.text: I'm an average guy with an extremely average size head and this doesn't even come close to fitting. WAY too small.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: The product has arrived, the package is very good, the operation is simple. I tried it for my father. It works very well and the effect is very good. It is very practical to stop snoring by lifting the chin and closing the mouth
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Enables me to use my BIPAP machine more effectively
customer_reviews.text: Prior to using this device my mouth would sag open and allow the air to escape. This is termed high leakage. Now that I am using the chin strap I no longer have the high leakage resulting in a better night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works....no more snoring...and no more sleep apnea
customer_reviews.text: I have sleep apnea and snore very loud...but not any more...this chin strap fits better then the single strap ones..they slide off your head..this one doesn't..my husband thanks you
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, I have had stubborn scars and sores since April, I have tried everything even cortisone creams from GP to no effect, 2 days of this and I can already see an improvement, so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: A great item for those who snore or have sleep Apnea
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. I have tried a couple of other styles but this is the first chin strap that does not slip off my chin during the night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prevent loose jaw opening
customer_reviews.text: It is soft to the touch, and the length of the Velcro can be adjusted. Try it at night to prevent the jaw from loosening. It's really easy to use, I didn't use my mouth to breathe, I only used my nose to breathe
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: The product is great.
customer_reviews.text: I snore in my sleep, which often affects the rest of my family, so I bought this product. It doesn't feel different when I wear it.The effect is also very good, do not worry about affecting the rest of the family.Five stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian buccella

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: As a Cpap wearer I got this to help me with keeping my mouth shut. The quality is real good. Used it for my husband and I must say it actually works and he is a heavy snorer I recommend this to someone who snores
customer_reviews.author: Donsbach Law Firm, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chin strap
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It took me a few minutes to figure out that that larger Velcro piece goes on the back of your head. It is comfortable to wear at night.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bearden

customer_reviews.title: The effect of stopping snoring is not bad!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery speed is super fast, the packaging is tight, there is no damage, and the snoring effect is not bad! It is not tight to wear, easy to operate and use, and it is not easy to fall off while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: ghadeer algabyali

customer_reviews.title: This anti snoring chin strap is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: This anti snoring chin strap is made of good material, it's soft to touch. It's not very tight, is breathable and works well. And it doesn't interfere with sleep and can be used for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lilla Bartos

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This came overnight and has helped me sleep so much better. I’ve had two neck surgeries which have changed my sleeping; this was the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Raychel F DeCorpo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: As I expected, it was very comfortable. So far, I am still very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: perfect match with my old Oral B tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: The brush heads are matched perfectly with my tooth brush. Personally I don't feel the difference between these brush heads and the original ones. It is the price that really convinces me to do more purchase next time. happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rylander

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as the Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: There's no reason to by Name Brand replacement brushes for 2-3 times the price when there quality alternatives. I can't see or tell any difference between these replacements and the Oral Bs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ladney

customer_reviews.title: Great product which really works
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical about this but thought I would give it a go and after just one night it works ! Both my partner and I got a better night sleep due to my reduced snoring! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dilallo

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is very good and worth recommending
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

product_meta.title: Anti Snoring Chin Strap, Snore Chin Strap, Stop Snoring, Snoring Solution, Adjustable & Breathable Anti Snoring Devices for Men Women, Black
feature_bullets: ANTI SNORE DEVICE: Anti Snoring Chin Strap Keeps The Mouth Closed Gently To Stop Snoring. No More Morning Breath, Disrupted Sleep, And Frustrated Loved Ones. This Anti-Snore Device Will Give You The Restful Sleep You Deserve To Be Fully Present And Successful!
BREATHABLE: Our Design Is Thin, Breathable, Effective, And Gentle, Giving You A Restful Night's Sleep. provides smooth and won’t scratch or irritate face skin. Say Goodbye To Stuffy, Thick Materials.

FUNCTION: The anti snoring chin straps keeps your mouth closed and open your airway let more oxygen into the lung therefore to instantly stop snoring, clenching, tooth grinding. It is the best anti stop snoring solution devices to prevent snoring.

AJUSTABLE: Easy to manage the tension strength of the anti snoring chin straps by tightening or loosening the Velcro strap. No matter adult, teen, children, man, woman, or child will fitsthis snoring chin strap perfectly in place without sliding off midnight.

SIMPLE TO USE: Simply sling over your head and place the strap in correct position around your chin, ears and face.Adjust straps by fastening at the top and behind the head. Simply insert the vent into the nostrils and sleep in silence. Effective to stop snoring originating from the nose.
